head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZWILLICH, AEDA Y.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZWILLICH, AEDA Y.

block.p: ZWILLICH-Aeda Y. (Formerly Brooklyn Heights). Beloved aunt of Dr. Ellen and Michael Feingold, Maurine and Dr. Jerry Schribman, Myra and Burt Freedman. Dear cousins Renee and Bob Wolff. Loving aunt of Harriet and Vin Avolio, Dr. Carol Lewis, Dr. Naomi and Doug Thorpe, Amy and Rabbi Ron Kronish, Dr. Clifford Zwillich, Dianne Wallace and Lowell Schulman, and Murray Singer. Special friends Loretta Mohamed and Blossom Alexander. For information: ''Wien & Wien'' 1-800-322-0533
